TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_cacebalen, title = cacebalen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/cacebalen} }

S.FORM: cacebalen 傘 yadah ku cacebalen i salining. siwkay nu balat u zuma a ngangan sa u "saung", saung sa u kamu nu Hulam. u Pangcah a kamu sa "linay". sapipalidung, sapitena' ku udad suleda' atu cilal..., u ayzaay a cacebalan yadah ku kulit. izaw ku matekesay izaw tu kapahay. maydih micakay ku tatayna tu cacebalan, izay mangaleb ku cilal i Taywan kiyami. tinaku a kamu kasicacebalen 要攜帶傘 la'cus ku demiad kasicacebalen tu! u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika An umbrella or parasol is a folding canopy supported by wooden or metal ribs, which is usually mounted on a wooden, metal, or plastic pole. It is designed to protect a person against rain or sunlight. The word "umbrella" typically refers to a device used for protection from rain. The word parasol usually refers to an item designed to protect from the sun. Often the difference is the material used for the canopy; some parasols are not waterproof. Umbrella canopies may be made of fabric or flexible plastic.

cacebalen 傘 yadah ko cacebalen i salining. siwkay no balat o zoma a ngangan sa o "saong", saong sa o kamo no Holam. o Pangcah a kamo sa "linay". sapipalidong, sapitena' ko odad soleda' ato cilal..., o ayzaay a cacebalan yadah ko kolit. izaw ko matekesay izaw to kapahay. maydih micakay ko tatayna to cacebalan, izay mangaleb ko cilal i Taywan kiyami. tinako a kamo kasicacebalen 要攜帶傘 la'cos ko demiad kasicacebalen to! o solit no Holam ato Amilika An ombrella or parasol is a folding canopy sopported by wooden or metal ribs, which is osoally moonted on a wooden, metal, or plastic pole. It is designed to protect a person against rain or sonlight. The word "ombrella" typically refers to a device osed for protection from rain. The word parasol osoally refers to an item designed to protect from the son. Often the difference is the material osed for the canopy; some parasols are not waterproof. Umbrella canopies may be made of fabric or flexible plastic.
